Title: Faulty sewage treatment plant at Wenlock Hospital: agency sacked
Content: Three months after the report of the Karnataka State Pollution Control Board on the faulty sewage treatment plant at Government Wenlock Hospital, the Arogya Raksha Samiti of the hospital on Wednesday
Author: Staff Correspondent
